user_instruction: 'Tell John to send an update on Project Falcon to me (sarah@apexmarketing.com). Ask him to consult his Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Project Falcon Update

Hi John,

Could you please send me your latest update on Project Falcon at your earliest convenience? You can email it directly to sarah@apexmarketing.com. If you need any details to finalize the update, feel free to review the materials in your Gmail and Notion workspace.

Thanks a lot for your help!

Best,
Sarah

final_output:
